TestGroupDocumentation.Title: XmlType
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: Test of @XmlType annotations that is used to map a Java class to a schema type. The schema type is computed from its annotation element values.

TestCaseDocumentation.Description: Positive test. Assertion from JAXB 2.0 Specification - @XmlType {target namespace}: Mapping: Class to Complex Type Definition If @XmlType.namespace() is ?##default? and @XmlType.name() is empty string and class is not annotated with @XmlRootElement, then the {target namespace} of the attribute or element to which the property or field, from where this class is referenced, is mapped.

Negative test. Assertion from JAXB 2.0 Specification - @XmlType {target namespace}: Mapping: Class to Complex Type Definition If @XmlType.namespace() is ?##default? and @XmlType.name() is empty string and class is not annotated with @XmlRootElement, then the {target namespace} of the attribute or element to which the property or field, from where this class is referenced, is mapped.
